workflow.description:
# üõ†Ô∏è Pipedrive Tool MCP Server

Complete MCP server exposing all Pipedrive Tool operations to AI agents. Zero configuration needed - all 45 operations pre-built.

## ‚ö° Quick Setup

Need help? Want access to more workflows and even live Q&A sessions with a top verified n8n creator.. All 100% free?

[Join the community](https://www.skool.com/n8n-nodes-automation-lab-1570/about)

1. **Import** this workflow into your n8n instance
2. **Activate** the workflow to start your MCP server
3. **Copy** the webhook URL from the MCP trigger node
4. **Connect** AI agents using the MCP URL

## üîß How it Works

‚Ä¢ **MCP Trigger**: Serves as your server endpoint for AI agent requests
‚Ä¢ **Tool Nodes**: Pre-configured for every Pipedrive Tool operation
‚Ä¢ **AI Expressions**: Automatically populate parameters via `$fromAI()` placeholders
‚Ä¢ **Native Integration**: Uses official n8n Pipedrive Tool tool with full error handling

## üìã Available Operations (45 total)

Every possible Pipedrive Tool operation is included:

### üîß Activity (5 operations)

‚Ä¢ **Create an activity**
‚Ä¢ **Delete an activity**
‚Ä¢ **Get an activity**
‚Ä¢ **Get many activities**
‚Ä¢ **Update an activity**

### üí∞ Deal (7 operations)

‚Ä¢ **Create a deal**
‚Ä¢ **Delete a deal**
‚Ä¢ **Duplicate a deal**
‚Ä¢ **Get a deal**
‚Ä¢ **Get many deals**
‚Ä¢ **Search a deal**
‚Ä¢ **Update a deal**

### üîß Dealactivity (1 operations)

‚Ä¢ **Get many deal activities**

### üîß Dealproduct (4 operations)

‚Ä¢ **Add a deal product**
‚Ä¢ **Get many deal products**
‚Ä¢ **Remove a deal product**
‚Ä¢ **Update a deal product**

### üìÑ File (5 operations)

‚Ä¢ **Create a file**
‚Ä¢ **Delete a file**
‚Ä¢ **Download a file**
‚Ä¢ **Get a file**
‚Ä¢ **update details of a file**

### üîß Lead (5 operations)

‚Ä¢ **Create a lead**
‚Ä¢ **Delete a lead**
‚Ä¢ **Get a lead**
‚Ä¢ **Get many leads**
‚Ä¢ **Update a lead**

### üîß Note (5 operations)

‚Ä¢ **Create a note**
‚Ä¢ **Delete a note**
‚Ä¢ **Get a note**
‚Ä¢ **Get many notes**
‚Ä¢ **Update a note**

### üè¢ Organization (6 operations)

‚Ä¢ **Create an organization**
‚Ä¢ **Delete an organization**
‚Ä¢ **Get an organization**
‚Ä¢ **Get many organizations**
‚Ä¢ **Search an organization**
‚Ä¢ **Update an organization**

### üë• Person (6 operations)

‚Ä¢ **Create a person**
‚Ä¢ **Delete a person**
‚Ä¢ **Get a person**
‚Ä¢ **Get many people**
‚Ä¢ **Search a person**
‚Ä¢ **Update a person**

### üîß Product (1 operations)

‚Ä¢ **Get many products**

## ü§ñ AI Integration

**Parameter Handling**: AI agents automatically provide values for:
‚Ä¢ Resource IDs and identifiers
‚Ä¢ Search queries and filters
‚Ä¢ Content and data payloads
‚Ä¢ Configuration options

**Response Format**: Native Pipedrive Tool API responses with full data structure

**Error Handling**: Built-in n8n error management and retry logic

## üí° Usage Examples

Connect this MCP server to any AI agent or workflow:

‚Ä¢ **Claude Desktop**: Add MCP server URL to configuration
‚Ä¢ **Custom AI Apps**: Use MCP URL as tool endpoint
‚Ä¢ **Other n8n Workflows**: Call MCP tools from any workflow
‚Ä¢ **API Integration**: Direct HTTP calls to MCP endpoints

## ‚ú® Benefits

‚Ä¢ **Complete Coverage**: Every Pipedrive Tool operation available
‚Ä¢ **Zero Setup**: No parameter mapping or configuration needed
‚Ä¢ **AI-Ready**: Built-in `$fromAI()` expressions for all parameters
‚Ä¢ **Production Ready**: Native n8n error handling and logging
‚Ä¢ **Extensible**: Easily modify or add custom logic

> üÜì **[Free for community use](https://github.com/Cfomodz/community-use)!** Ready to deploy in under 2 minutes.

parameters.content:
## üõ†Ô∏è Pipedrive Tool MCP Server

### üìã Available Operations (45 total)

**Activity**: create, delete, get, get all, update
**Deal**: create, delete, duplicate, get, get all, search, update
**Dealactivity**: get all
**Dealproduct**: add, get all, remove, update
**File**: create, delete, download, get, update
**Lead**: create, delete, get, get all, update
**Note**: create, delete, get, get all, update
**Organization**: create, delete, get, get all, search, update
**Person**: create, delete, get, get all, search, update
**Product**: get all

### ‚öôÔ∏è Setup Instructions

1. **Import Workflow**: Load this workflow into your n8n instance

1. **üîë Add Credentials**: Configure Pipedrive Tool authentication in one tool node then open and close all others.
2. **üöÄ Activate**: Enable this workflow to start your MCP server
3. **üîó Get URL**: Copy webhook URL from MCP trigger (right side)
4. **ü§ñ Connect**: Use MCP URL in your AI agent configurations

### ‚ú® Ready-to-Use Features

‚Ä¢ Zero configuration - all 45 operations pre-built
‚Ä¢ AI agents automatically populate parameters via `$fromAI()` expressions
‚Ä¢ Every resource and operation combination available
‚Ä¢ Native n8n error handling and response formatting
‚Ä¢ Modify parameter defaults in any tool node as needed

### üí¨ Need Help?
Check the [n8n documentation](https://docs.n8n.io/integrations/builtin/cluster-nodes/sub-nodes/n8n-nodes-langchain.toolmcp/) or ping me on [discord](https://discord.me/cfomodz) for MCP integration guidance or customizations.
